Category I 60 % in 10th , 12th , UG and PG as applicable and no year gap in studies.Category II 60 % in 10th , 12th , UG and PG as applicable and upto 2 year gap in studies.

As an artificial intelligence language model, I am not a physical robot, but rather a computer program running on servers. My purpose is to process natural language inputs and generate responses that mimic human-like conversation.

I understand that you may be looking for a job. Here are some suggestions that may help you in your job search: 1.Define your job search criteria: Before starting your job search, it is important to define the type of job you're looking for, including the industry, job title, location, salary, and other relevant factors. 2.Create a strong resume and cover letter: A well-written resume and cover letter can make a significant impact on your job search. Tailor your resume and cover letter to the job you're applying for, highlighting your relevant skills and experience.  3.Prepare for interviews: Once you start receiving interview requests, it's important to prepare thoroughly. Research the company and the job role, and practice your interview skills.

1.Research the company 2.Review the job description 3.Practice common interview questions  4.Dress appropriately  5.Arrive on time  6.Bring copies of your resume and cover letter  7.Follow up after the interview
1.Find the job posting 2.Prepare your application materials 3.Submit your application 4.Follow up
Can you tell me about yourself?,What are your strengths and weaknesses?,Why are you interested in this position?,Where do you see yourself in five years?
